name: Hot Heat Reset: Chapter 1 (itch)
description:
Hot Heat Reset: Chapter 1 is the first chapter of the game, Hot Heat Reset, which is a fast-paced maze action puzzle game where you play as an unknown speedster hiding under a skull who is in pursuit to recover his stolen lands where an explosives factory is under operation.

The full game is set to release in May, 2023. You can add it to your Wishlist on Steam!

Chapter 1 is also available on Steam as a "Free-To-Play" game with 21 Steam Achievements!

MORE ABOUT THE GAME

Progress through different levels laid across different chapters and unlock new deployable elements and new playable characters along the way. The game features

  • Large explorable level layouts
  • Fast paced grid based movement
  • Dozens of deployable elements
  • Dozens of playable characters
  • LOTS OF EXPLOSIONS!

HOW TO PLAY

Supported Input Devices: Keyboard, Gamepad

Follow along the tutorial chapter (Chapter 0) in the game to get familiarized with the keyboard / gamepad controls.
